price: Isaan shira shiran, Nutis shira shirre odoo isaan hinbeekin.
arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا وَمَكَرۡنَا مَكۡرٗا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wamakarū makran wamakarnā makran wahum lā yashʿurūna
